item.title: AssignedTo and AffectedUser with Powershell – Service Manager
item.description: So recently I got an e-mail to my newly setup e-mail address, for just this reason , from someone asking if I knew a way to do the following. “I was trying to find a way to find all Incidents related to a specific person (assigned to or affected user) using PowerShell” So, I decided the best to answer this with a blog post as maybe there are other people out there asking the same question.
